zope.security.protectclass¶

Make assertions about permissions needed to access instance attributes

zope.security.protectclass.protectName(class_, name, permission)[source]¶

Set a permission on a particular name.

zope.security.protectclass.protectSetAttribute(class_, name, permission)[source]¶

Set a permission on a particular name.

zope.security.protectclass.protectLikeUnto(class_, like_unto)[source]¶

Use the protections from like_unto for the given class.
